room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We did the Bank Heist and it was very very fun and exciting! You really have to work together. We got out with just four minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: An amazing place to go the staff was very helpful and polite. For our room (bank heist) we had big red and Dan as our room guides. Definitely going back again with more friends.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Had a great time. For our first ever escape we did the Bank Heist. We didn't make it through but we will try again. Stephanie was great, she gave us wonderful clues.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Great time, very unique. We attempted the Bank Heist room, was super difficult, but we had an awesome time!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We had a great time! Our room host was Isaiah and he was a lot of fun, Great place to enjoy yourself and use your brain.
